alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Montgomery; Walker; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 10:30PM CDT until June 11 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR BURLESON...CENTRAL GRIMES...SOUTHERN BRAZOS...NORTHERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND WEST CENTRAL WALKER COUNTIES... At 1029 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles west of Riverside to 9 miles northeast of Anderson to near Caldwell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated and reports from broadcast media. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... College Station, southern Bryan, Navasota, Caldwell, Somerville, Snook, Millican, Anderson, Lake Somerville Dam, Kyle Field, Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway, Lyons, Deanville, Independence, Chriesman, Wellborn, Roans Prairie and Carlos. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Montgomery; Walker; Washington
